dialogue.line: Father - *praying...*
Father - How can I help you son?
Clyde - Father, the World is in DANGER!!
Father - In Danger? Why? I hope this isn't another bad joke!
Clyde - It's not! I wouldn't come here and interrupt your prayers in vain...
Father - Why do you think I can believe you?
Father - From me? Why?
Clyde - You represent the OLDEST faction in the World, you must know what to do!

option.text: 2) He's the only with the STRENGHT to do the job...

dialogue.line: Father - What job? Can you explain yourself?
Clyde - We need to KILL Abbadon Father! We need God's STRENGHT!

option.text: 3) We are NOT praying for the RIGHT God!

dialogue.line: Father - You're trying to tell me, representant of GOD down here, that there's another GOD? Come on...
Father - Son?
Father - Well, with just that, I'm still not very convinced...

option.text: 1) Many people follows you. Together we can BEAT Him!!

dialogue.line: Father - Well, you may have a point, nothing is more powerful than fighting for God...
Clyde - More people means greater chances of BEATING him!

option.text: 2) You have the most followers behind you, your HELP is crucial.

dialogue.line: Father - Indeed, if this is a real problem, you're quite right.
Clyde - We need to bring as many as possible with us...

option.text: 3) Your followers just follow you because of your God.

dialogue.line: Father - Of course they follow, there's NO ONE else to follow!
Father - Son?
Father - I can see that this isn't a joke son...

option.text: 1) Father, you know, deep in you, we need to FIGHT Abaddon!

dialogue.line: Father - I really have that power in my hands, right now...
Clyde - It is the best way to really show God's power!

option.text: 2) We really need to find a way...

dialogue.line: Father - This seems really serious, son. Maybe I can do something...
Clyde - Please Father, Abaddon is bringing the END.

option.text: 3) Now it's up to you, either you're with us, or you're against us!

dialogue.line: Father - Us who?
Clyde - Abaddon and his followers!!
Father - There's no Abaddon, son! Take that thought out of your head...
Father - Son?
Clyde - Alright, I guess I have nothing more to say. Your call!
Father - Alright, alright son... May God be with you!
